title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate cavalry uniform and snake belt buckle with two revolvers]  (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate cavalry uniform and snake belt buckle with two revolvers] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.4 x 8.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
